column1: This is the genuine product. I was nervous to order form a third party as often they are fake. Original box, sealed and the proper scent and texture. Arrived in 2-3 days too! Will order again. Thank you! * if you haven't tried this, it's a gel cream. Dries down nice with no greasy or sticky residue. Perfect for oily skin that has dry patches. It's a light moisturizer. I can wear it under makeup no problem and use it as my primer.
